name: Sphere Dash 2 3D
description:
Sphere Dash is back! bringing on more levels and more elaborate and challenging than ever. Level difficulties range from hard to Legendary. Concept is simple, you have to make the ball reach the other end of the screen by avoiding all obstacles. As much as the concept is easy to grasp the game itself is very challenging will make you guess harder with each progressing levels. Game has different color themes, and absolutely free to play.

Controls:

Use WASD to move the ball.

Press the R Key to Restart the level your on.
